Name: Observable Space Bound
Meaning: Local optima count for c-bounded moves

Name: Five-Headed Loss
Formula: loss = alpha*node + beta*edge + gamma*clique + delta*type + epsilon*content

Name: Approximation Bound
Meaning: Local-global gap bounded by overlap degree c

Name: Quantum Local Search
Meaning: Quantum speedup of polynomial local search

Name: CLT Threshold
Meaning: When Central Limit Theorem becomes applicable

Name: Smooth Factorization
Meaning: Multiplicity of decompositions for smooth numbers

Name: Information Bound
Meaning: Entropy bounded by observable space size

Name: Levinthal Time
Meaning: Polynomial protein folding vs brute force

Name: Quantifier Elimination
Formula: exists x phi(x) = OR over domain

Name: Generalized Nittay Singular Value
Meaning: c-bounded move constraint matrix singular value

Name: Lambda Hidden Variable
Meaning: Einstein's hidden variable for c-bounded moves

Name: Inverse Nittay Sampling
Meaning: Minimum samples for ε-approximation of continuous

Name: P-Exponential Boundary
Formula: |S_obs| = O(n^c); P iff c=O(1); Exp iff c=O(n)

Name: GPS Accuracy Formula
Meaning: c=4 GPS accuracy with trajectory diversity

Name: PSPACE Depth Collapse
Formula: PSPACE(d) = O(d × n^c) for fixed d
Meaning: Bounded alternation depth converts PSPACE to polynomial NP chain

Name: Alternation Cost
Meaning: Each quantifier level adds one polynomial factor

Name: Fog Horizon Formula
Meaning: Fix depth where evaluation stabilizes - design choice

Name: Hierarchy Mapping
Meaning: Number systems map to complexity classes via bounding structure

Name: EXPTIME State Bound
Formula: EXPTIME(s) = PSPACE for s = poly(n) state bits
Meaning: State space representation size determines EXPTIME vs PSPACE

Name: Bounded Noise Structure
Meaning: Bounded sampling converts white noise to structured signal

Name: Nitai Gravity Correction
Formula: M_actual = Σᵢ mᵢ × Nitai(rᵢ tᵢ) ≠ ∫ρ(r)dV = M_expected
Meaning: Discrete bounded sum differs from continuous integral by Dark Matter amount

Name: Dark Matter Elimination
Meaning: The missing mass was never there - miscalculation artifact

Name: Full Hierarchy Collapse
Formula: P = NP(c) = PSPACE(d) = EXPTIME(s) for c d s = O(1)
Meaning: All classes collapse to P when appropriate parameter is bounded

Name: Compression-Computability
Formula: H(x) = O(log n) ↔ x ∈ P; H(x) = O(n) ↔ x incompressible → incomputable
